HiddenText.Name: CE evening school Q18
HiddenText.BodyCopy: If admitted as a Community student through C.E., but not as a full-time matriculating student with a track assignment, you are not eligible for many full-time student services. This includes housing - you are not eligible to live in approved housing. For more information regarding housing, contact the Housing Department at http://beta.byui.edu/housing or (208) 496-9220.
